isKeepSrcElementName

public boolean isKeepSrcElementName()
Getter for the keepSrcElementName flag

isVirtual

public boolean isVirtual()
Returns true if the copy operation is a virtual copy operation. These copy operations exist to implement variable initialization and fromParts and toParts processing. The only difference between these and the ones in activities are that they do not cause faults for declaring the keepSrcElementName behavior when the copy operation isn't an element to element style copy.

isIgnoreMissingFromData

public boolean isIgnoreMissingFromData()
If true, then a that results in zero nodes will cause the to be a no-op. The MUST NOT be executed.
